name: Crunchyroll Dark theme [bg customizable~NO ADS]
description:
Crunchyroll Dark theme [bg customizable/NO ADS]
I highly recommend always use an adblock like uBlock Origin.
* Now you can use the default background or use what you want, you just need to upload the image.
* Choose if the footer is displayed or not.

discussions.name: Theme active on all website pages, not just crunchyroll
